Dear ~EasyUser.getDisplayName~,

Thank you for registering your DANS EASY account '~EasyUser.getId~'.

Please click on the link below to confirm your registration and to complete the registration procedure:

~Registration.getValidationUrl~

This link will be valid for 3 days and can only be used once.
If clicking this link doesn't work, please try copying the entire link text into the 'address bar' of your browser (where you usually type a website address).
